name: Tiny Frog Hotel
description:
ControlsClicking on the froggy clock will allow you to progress to the next day.

AWSD / Arrow Keys - Move Camera

Scroll Wheel - Camera Zoom

How to Play

You will need to spend the limited amount of time that you have each day in order to build new rooms and do tasks for your hotel.

  • Pressing the Building tab will allow you to build new rooms for your hotel
    • Frogs have a type of room that they would like to stay in as well as an amenity that they would like to see somewhere in the hotel. If their desires are met, then they will give you a better star rating and pay more lily pads for their stay.
    • New buildings will become available as you earn a higher star rating for your hotel, so make sure to check the different building tabs.
  • Pressing the Tasks tab will reveal any tasks that are available on any of the rooms within your hotel.
    • You can only do a task if you have the time and the means, for example in order to place a frog in a room you will need at least 30 minutes and an empty guest room.
  • Pressing the Loan tab will allow you to make payments on your loan.
Credits
  • Jorddagreatest (that's me) - Programming, Art, Game Design
  • Tallbeard Studios - Music ("Feeling Cute, Might Delete Later" (Looped by Jorddagreatest))
  • GGBotNet & Emhuo - Fonts

Thanks for playing! :)
